subject: World Baseball Classic
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tony La Russa says Yadier Molina, who has helped Puerto Rico reached the World Baseball Classic final, is “as great a catcher as anybody that’s ever played the game.”
snippet: Tony La Russa says Yadier Molina, who has helped Puerto Rico reached the World Baseball Classic final, is “as great a catcher as anybody that’s ever played the game.”
